If you are reading this review because you want to know if you should buy the game you're a bit late. Buy and play it anyway.
Jogo nota 10, divertido e muito bom para jogar coop.

Innovative gameplay, fun yet challenging puzzles, atmospheric as hell, and a memorable piece of story to hold all of those foundations together. The game still holds up to this day is thanks to its multiplayer capability and workshop integration. This game is practically endless by creating its own contents by each day. The once feeling of frustration of singleplayer puzzle solving is now a fun multiplayer puzzle solving -- or smashing each other... I guess?

I wouldn't believe anyone if they say they haven't played this game before. If you haven't (which is barbaric) this is a great game and you should experience it.

great backstab simulator # lroenzos is delaidne
Great

Portal 2 follows its predecessor telling the story of Chell, a human test subject, in the labs of Aperture Science.
Goes without saying, the first episode is a must in order to comprehend many of the events in this sequel, but it is not necessary to play the game itself.

Pros:
+ Masterwork in audio modeling, I was really astonished by the level of detail of refractions, reverbs and all;
+ This sequel is more deep story-wide, providing background for Aperture Science and GlaDOS;
+ More depth in puzzles, adding more components and a time factor.
+ Less "all is set for you to solve it" feeling.

Cons:
- ...none? Maybe some puzzles are a bit confusing, but with time and patience anyone can solve them.

A tip: keep yourself from looking how the puzzles are solved online, and be proud of yourself ;)

I just completed this game and it waas one of the best experiances I have ever had. This game brings amazing story, and fun but challenging puzzles that I completly recomend for any one that wants to play puzzle game
Such a great game!

The Portal story continues...

+ new things to play around with in chambers
+ main characters still have awesome irony and I just love them
+ most things aren't as hard as they look at start - been stuck at two places just cause I was bit overthinking it
+ multiplayer - brings us new characters to play with + is extremely fun and coop
+ extras - highly suggested to check out, especially the comics!
+ the end - don't press Esc and enjoy the whole finish line

Whoever played Portal will not be disappointed, who is new should play Portal 1st to not to miss out on story.
I didn't really find anything to not to like about the game, maybe wouldn't mind even bit more harder chambers? :P
... but that's why we can make community chambers!

enjoy this game with your friends!
A very nice co-op game
I think its an awesome game, love the radio transmission easter egg.

I bought the two-player pack so my brother and I could play and boy is it fun! I've wanted this game for so long but just recently bought it during the steam summer sale. The deal was AMAZING! (normally ~$35 for the two-player pack but only $8.74 during the sale!). I know I don't have that many hours as of this post, but I can already tell I'm going to be playing this game for a long time to come.

For a game that came out 5 years ago, it's still kicking!
